meanings.definition: To dress or groom oneself carefully and in a finicky manner.
meanings.sent1: She spent hours prinking in front of the mirror before the party.
meanings.sent2: Every morning, he enjoys prinking by choosing the perfect outfit.
meanings.sent3: The cat was prinking itself so meticulously that it looked like a little fashion model.
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail while prinking was like an artist meticulously painting a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The image of her prinking in the soft morning light was a scene of delicate beauty.

meanings.definition: To adorn or decorate oneself in a showy or elaborate way.
meanings.sent1: During the festival, she was prinking with colorful ribbons and glitter.
meanings.sent2: The peacock prinks its feathers to attract a mate.
meanings.sent3: He was prinking so much for the costume party that he ended up looking like a walking disco ball.
meanings.sent4: The tree prinked itself with golden leaves, ready for the autumn ball.
meanings.sent5: Her prinking with jewels and sequins made her shine like a star on the red carpet.
